amendment.description: Amendment sought to prevent any rule that improves drinking water quality from being delayed.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 114-395 to prevent the rules in the underlying bill from being delayed if it protects drinking water quality.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 223 (Roll no. 38).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Kildee.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Kildee amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 223 (Roll no. 38).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
